description_top: 3 works by 3 authors on the subject of Persian poetry
catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: 3 works by 3 authors on the subject of Persian poetry
author: Qāsim Anvār, ʻAlī ibn Naṣīr, 1356-1433 قاسم انوار، على بن نصير
contents: Dīvān-i Ḥāfiẓ (ff. 1-6 and 12b-236b, two centre columns). Dīvān-i Maghribī (ff. 3b-124b, margin column, and 7a-12a, two centre columns). Dīvān-i Qāsim-i Anvār (ff. 124b-317b, margin column).
record_origin: Manuscript description based on: Beeston, A. F. L. (Alfred Felix Landon); Ethé, Hermann, 1844-1917.; Sachau, Eduard, 1845-1930; Catalogue of the Persian, Turkish, Hindûstânî, and Pushtû manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Oxford; at the Clarendon Press 1889-1953.
